Type Parameters:

All Known Subinterfaces:
CategoryDao, CourseDao, StudentDao, TeacherDao, UserDao
All Known Implementing Classes:
MySqlCategoryDao, MySqlCourseDao, MySqlStudentDao, MySqlTeacherDao, MySqlUserDao
public interface Dao<T>
CRUD DAO interface. Implement CRUD methods in all concrete DAOs
Version:
1.0
Author:

  • Method Details

    • get

      Optional<T> get(String param) throws DAOException
      Obtains instance of entity from database by param
      Parameters:
      param - - parameter value
      Returns:
      Optional.ofNullable - entity is null if the entity is not found.
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException

    • add

      void add(T t) throws DAOException, ValidateException
      Insert record into database
      Parameters:
      t - - concrete entity in implementations
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException
      ValidateException

    • update

      void update(T t) throws DAOException, ValidateException
      Updates entity
      Parameters:
      t - should contain all necessary fields
      Throws:

      ValidateException

      void delete(int id) throws DAOException, ValidateException
      Deletes record in database table
      Parameters:
      id - - value of id field in database
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException
      ValidateException

    • getAll

      Map.Entry<Integer,List<T>> getAll(String param) throws DAOException
      Obtains list of all entities from database
      Parameters:
      param - - parameter value
      Returns:
      entities list
      Throws:
      DAOException - is wrapper for SQLException
